meanings.definition: The process of adding an epoxide group to a compound.
meanings.sent1: During epoxidation, a new group is added to the compound.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the epoxidation of various compounds in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The epoxidation process in the experiment was like a puzzle coming together.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was an epoxidation of ideas, forming a unique solution.
meanings.sent5: The epoxidation transformed the compound into a completely different substance.

meanings.definition: The reaction in which an epoxide is formed.
meanings.sent1: The epoxidation resulted in the formation of a new epoxide.
meanings.sent2: Chemists observed the epoxidation occurring rapidly in the flask.
meanings.sent3: The epoxidation reaction was like a magic trick turning one compound into another.
meanings.sent4: His words were an epoxidation of emotions, creating a powerful impact.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the epoxidation was like seeing a caterpillar transform into a butterfly.
